title: Infinitely Polar Bear. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2015)
description:
In theaters: May 22nd, 2015

Description:

Based on a true story, INFINITELY POLAR BEAR is a funny and heartbreaking portrait of the many unexpected ways in which parents and children save each other.

Director: Maya Forbes

Writers: Maya Forbes

Actors: Mark Ruffalo, Zoe Saldana, Imogene Wolodarsky, Ashley Aufderheide, Beth Dixon, Keir Dullea

Genre: Drama

Run Time: 1 hour 28 minutes
